flawed_nl_solution:
He made $600 mowing yards, $250 for his birthday, $150 selling items and $150 doing odd jobs so he made 600+250+150+150 = $<<600+250+150+150=1155>>1155
He made $1155 and will save 40% so he saves 1155*0.4 = $<<1155*0.4=462>>462
#### 462

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1150, not 1155. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
